channel.title: Pacific Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pacific Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 55
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 55 - US-199/Redwood Highway/South Grants Pass/Crescent City (California).

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 45A
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 45A - OR-99/Rouge River Route.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 43
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 43 - OR-99/Rogue River Route. This exit also provides access to OR-234.

item.title: I-5 North Exits 307 and 308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307 - OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Hayden Island/DOT Permits. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 306B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 306B - Victory Blvd./Expo Center. Use Exit 307 for T-6 (Terminal 6)/Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 304 - Rosa Parks Way.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit305 A-B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 305AB - US-30 By-Pass/Lombard St

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 304, Rosa Parks Way. Distance marker for next three exits - Lombard Ave., Columbia Blvd., and Martin Luther King Jr Blvd.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302B - I-405 South/US-30 West/St. Helens. US-30 westbound leaves I-5 northbound here. Continue north on I-5 for Seattle.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp
item.description: I-5 South - Exit 300B Offramp in Portland. Use right lane for Morrison St./City Center. Use left lane for Oregon City and OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry).

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 300B
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 300B - US-26 East/OR-99E/OMSI (Oregon Museum of Science and Industry)/Oregon City. The Willamette River is in the background.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 301
item.description: I-5 South approaching Exit 301 - I-84/US-30 West/The Dalles. I-84 eastbound begins here, and ends in northeastern Utah. Continue on I-5 south for Salem.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 300B
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 300B. Use Exit 300B for Central Eastside/Industrial District.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 302A
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 302A - Broadway - Weidler St./Moda Center.

item.title: US-26 West at I-5/OR-10/OR-43 in Portland
item.description: US-26 West at I-5/OR-10/OR-43 in Portland. Use right lane for I-5 South and OR-43 to Lake Oswego (OR-43) and Salem (I-5). Use outer right lane for US-26 West to (Portland) City Center. Use left lane for OR-10 West/Barbur Blvd.

item.title: US-26 West on the Ross Island Bridge
item.description: US-26 West on the Ross Island Bridge approaching I-5, OR-10, and OR-43. Use right lane for I-5 and OR-43 to Salem (I-5) and Lake Oswego (OR-43). Use left lanes for US-26 and OR-10 to City Center (Portland - via US-26) and Barbur Blvd. (OR-10).

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 194 A-B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 194A - OR-126 East/Springfield. Approaching Exit 194B - I-105/OR-126 West/Eugene.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 192 and 194AB
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 192 - OR-99/Bus. OR-126 West/University of Oregon/Eugene Downtown. Approaching (Exit 194AB) I-105/OR-126. Continue north on I-5 for Portland.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 191 and 192
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 191 - Bus. OR-126 East/Glenwood Blvd./Springfield Downtown. Approaching Exit 192 - OR-99/Bus. OR-126 West/University of Oregon/Eugene Downtown. Use Exit 192 for University of Oregon Museums.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 189
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 189 30th Ave./South Eugene

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 188B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 188B - OR-99 South/Goshen.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 188A
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 188A - OR-58/Willamette Highway/Oakridge. OR-58 follows the Willamette River east to Willamette Pass where it crosses the Cascades.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 188A - Central Oregon
item.description: I-5 North approachign Exit 188A. Use Exit 188A for Central Oregon (via OR-58 and Willamette Pass).

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 188A
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 188A - OR-58/Willamette Highway/Oakridge.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 186
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 186 - Dillard Road/Goshen.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 182
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 182 - Creswell.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 176
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 176 - Saginaw.

item.title: Row River Road East at I-5 North
item.description: Row River Road East at I-5 North to Eugene.

item.title: Gateway Blvd. north at I-5/Row River Road.
item.description: Gateway Blvd. north at I-5 and Row River Road. Continue straight for I-5 south to Roseburg; turn right on Row River Road for I-5 north to Eugene; left for (Cottage Grove) City Center.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 174
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 174 - Cottage Grove/Dorena Lake.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 174
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 174 - Cottage Grove/Dorena Lake.

item.title: I-5 North - Lane County
item.description: Entering Lane County on I-5 north.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 170
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 170 - OR-99/Cottage Grove. At the sign at the interchange, this is labeled Business OR-99. Signs through the town of Cottage Grove, do not include the word Business.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 163
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 163 - Curtin/Lorane.

item.title: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5
item.description: OR-38 East/OR-99 North at I-5. Use I-5 South to Roseburg; I-5 north to Cottage Grove and Portland. This is the eastern end of OR-38. This segment of OR-99 ends here, and re-appears in Cottage Grove.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 58
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 58 - OR-99/To US-199/Redwood Highway/Grants Pass/City Center. The name of the highway is common on many interstate exit signs, especially in western Oregon.

item.title: I-5 South - Grants Pass Exits
item.description: Grants Pass - Next 2 Exits on I-5 south.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 61
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 61 - Merlin.

item.title: I-5 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-5 south. Distance to Grants Pass, Medford, and Ashland.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 66
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 66 - Hugo.

item.title: I-5 South - Sexton Mountain Summit
item.description: I-5 south at Sexton Mountain Summit - Elevation 1960 Feet. This summit is one a series of passes I-5 crosses between Canyonville and Grants Pass in the Klamath Mountains. The milepost is also attached to the main sign.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 71
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 71 - Sunny Valley.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 76
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 76 - Wolf Creek

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 78 - Speaker Road.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 78 - Speaker Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Entering Josephine County
item.description: Entering Josephine County on I-5 south. Many of the county line signs in southern Oregon (and Del Norte County California) contain the phrase We Honor Veterans.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 80
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 80 - Glendale.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 86
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 86 - Quines Creek Road/Barton Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 88
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 88 - Azalea/Galesville Reservoir.

item.title: I-5 South - Canyon Creek Summit
item.description: I-5 south at Canyon Creek Summit - Elevation 2020 Feet. Canyon Creek Summit is the highest of the series of passes in the Klamath Mountains between Canyonville and Grants Pass along I-5.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 98 - Canyonville/Days Creek.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 99 - North Canyonville/Crater Lake.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 106 - Tri City/Myrtle Creek.

item.title: OR-99 North at I-5 (Exit 109) Onramp
item.description: OR-99 North at I-5 (Exit 109) onramp. Use I-5 north for Roseburg; I-5 south for Grants Pass.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 109 and 103 Route Diagram
item.description: Route Diagram showing OR-99 access to I-5 for Myrtle Creek and Riddle.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 108 - Myrtle Creek.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 110 - Boomer Hill Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 112
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 112 - Dillard/Winston. OR-99 connects back with I-5 here.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 113 - Round Prairie/Clarks Branch Road.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 121 - McLain Ave.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 123 - Fairgrounds/Umpqua Park.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138. Turn right for I-5 south for Fairgrounds and Medford. Straight for I-5 North/OR-138 West to Portland; and straight for OR-138 East to City Center.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East Approaching I-5/OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East approaching I-5/OR-138 in Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 South
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 South to Fairgrounds and Medford.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 Junction
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 junction. OR-138 west joins I-5 northbound.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5. Turn right for I-5 north to Portland; use left lane for I-5 south to Medford and Fairgrounds.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5 in Roseburg. Use right lane for I-5 North and OR-138 West. OR-138 west joins I-5 north to Sutherlin.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 south. Use I-5 south for Eugene. Turn right for Airport Road and Fair/Expo. Continue straight for US-20 west.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5 South
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 south to Eugene.

item.title: US-20 West at I-5 North
item.description: US-20 west at I-5 north to Salem and Portland.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching I-5
item.description: US-20 west approaching I-5 in Albany.

item.title: OR-34 East at I-5 North
item.description: OR-34 east at I-5 north. Use I-5 north for Salem; continue east on OR-34 for Lebanon. Notice the Freeway Entrance sign here. This type of sign is not common in Oregon at freeway entrances.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5 North
item.description: OR-34 east approaching I-5 north. Use right lane for I-5 north to Salem.

item.title: OR-34 East at I-5 South
item.description: OR-34 east at I-5 south. Turn right for I-5 south to Eugene; continue over freeway for I-5 north to Salem.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-34 east approaching I-5. I-5 traffic use right lane.

item.title: OR-34 East Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-34 East approaching I-5.

item.title: I-5 South at OR-228
item.description: I-5 south at OR-228 junction. Turn right on OR-228 for Halsey and Junction City. Turn left on OR-228 for Brownsville and Linn County Historical Museum.

item.title: I-5 South at OR-34
item.description: I-5 south at OR-34 junction. Turn right for OR-34 west to Linn-Benton (Community College), Corvallis, and Oregon State (University). Turn left for Lebanon.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 228 - OR-34/Lebanon/Corvallis.

item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 253 - OR-22/Bus. OR-99E/Detroit Lake/Bend.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 258 - North Salem/Fairgrounds/Amphitheater.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 260B - Keizer. Approaching Exit 260A - OR-99E/Salem Parkway.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 263 - Brooks/Gervais.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 282A - OR-551/Canby/Hubbard.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 282B - Charbonneau District. Approaching Exit 282A - OR-551/Canby/Hubbard.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 283 - Wilsonville Road.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the eastern loop around Portland. Seattle bound traffic, or traffic bound for I-84 east might find I-205 faster than going through downtown Portland.

item.title: I-5 North - Portland Route Diagram
item.description: Portland area route diagram on I-5 north approaching I-205 junction.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 286 and 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 286 - Elligsen Road/Boones Ferry Road. Approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City.

item.title: I-5 North - Entering Washington County
item.description: Entering Washington County on I-5 north in Wilsonville.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 286
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 286 - Elligsen Road/Boones Ferry Road.

item.title: SW Wilsonville Road at I-5
item.description: SW Wilsonville Road at I-5 north to Portland (Exit 283).

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 289 and 286
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road. Approaching Exit 286 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 289
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road. An I-5 south shield is attached to the sign structure.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area. I-205 rejoins I-5 again north of Vancouver, Washington.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 290 and 289
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 290 - Lower Boones Ferry Road. Approaching Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 291 and 290
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 291 - Carman Drive. Approaching Exit 290 - Lower Boones Ferry Road.

item.title: End OR-217 South at I-5
item.description: End OR-217 south at I-5. Use right lane for I-5 south to Salem. Use left lane for I-5 north to Portland. Continue ahead for Kruse Way into Lake Oswego. The OR-217 freeway ends here.

item.title: OR-217 South at Exit 7
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 7 - 72nd Ave. Approaching I-5 to Salem and Portland. The OR-217 south freeway ends at I-5.

item.title: OR-217 South Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-217 South approaching I-5 to Salem and Portland.

item.title: I-5 South at I-405 Split
item.description: I-5 south at the I-405 split in Portland. Use left lane for I-405 North/US-26 West/Beaverton. Use right lane for I-5 South/Salem. This exit ramp is on the end of the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River.

item.title: I-84 To I-5 Ramp at City Center IC
item.description: Ramp connecting I-84 west to I-5 south at City Center/OMSI exit. Continue south for I-5 south to Beaverton and Salem. OMSI stands for the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry.

item.title: I-105 East at Exit 4B - I-5 North
item.description: I-105 East/OR-126 East at Exit 4B - I-5 North/Portland. I-105 ends at Exit 4B, OR-126 continues east to Springfield.

item.title: I-105/OR-126 East Approaching I-5
item.description: I-105/OR-126 East approaching I-5 at Exit 4A and 4B. Exit 4A - I-5 South/Roseburg. Exit 4B - I-5 North/Portland

item.title: I-105/OR-126 East at Exit 2
item.description: I-105/OR-126 East at Exit 2 - Country Club Road/Coburg Road

item.title: I-5 South at I-405/US-26
item.description: I-5 south at I-405/US-26 to City Center and Beaverton. Taken on the western approach to the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River. I-5 continues south to Salem.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching I-405
item.description: I-5 south approaching I-405/US-26 to City Center and Beaverton. Taken on the Marquam Bridge over the Willamette River. I-5 continues south to Salem.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 55
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 55- US-199/Redwood Highway/Ocean Beaches/Crescent City

item.title: For US-199 Truck Traffic - Use Exit 55
item.description: For truck traffic on US-199 South use Exit 55.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 48
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 48 - City of Rogue River

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 45B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 45B - Valley of the Rogue State Park

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 45A
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 45A - OR-99/Rogue River Route.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 43
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 43 - OR-99/Rogue River Route. This exit also provides access to OR-234.

item.title: I-5 - Exit 40 Onramp
item.description: I-5 onramp at Exit 40, the eastern Gold Hill interchange. Use I-5 north for Grants Pass. Use I-5 south for Medford.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 1A and Exit 1B (Washington)
item.description: I-5 north approaching Washington Exit 1A - WA-14 East/Camas and Exit 1B - City Center/6th St./Convention Center. Taken on Interstate Bridge over Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307 Onramp - Drawbridge
item.description: Exit 307 onramp onto I-5 north. Warning sign for drawbridge on I-5 north over the Columbia River.

item.title: Marine Drive West at I-5 North
item.description: Marine Drive west at I-5 north onramp to Seattle.

item.title: Marine Drive West Approaching I-5 North
item.description: Marine Drive west approaching I-5 north onramp (Exit 307) towards Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens. US-30 leaves I-5 here and continues on I-405 across the Willamette River.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302C
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302C - Greeley Ave./Swan Island. In the background is the I-5/I-405 split.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 302B
item.description: For I-5 north to Seattle use left lanes. Approaching Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 302A and 302B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 302A - Rose Quarter/Broadway-Weidler St. Approaching Exit 302B - I-405/US-30 West/St. Helens.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 302A
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 302A - Rose Quarter/Broadway - Weidler St.

item.title: End I-84 West at I-5
item.description: End I-84 West at I-5. Use I-5 north to Seattle; I-5 south to Salem.

item.title: I-84 West - Use I-5 North For US-30.
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use I-5 north to continue west on US-30.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5 in Portland. Use right lanes for I-5 north to Seattle; left lanes for I-5 south to Salem. This is the western end of I-84.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5
item.description: I-84 west approaching I-5. Use right lane for Convention Center/Rose Quarter via I-5 north. Use middle lane for Seattle and (Portland) City Center via I-5 north. Use left lane for Beaverton and Salem.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching I-5 to Salem and Seattle
item.description: I-84 West approaching I-5 to Salem and Seattle.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 1 - Lloyd Center.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 1A/1B (Washington)
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 1A, WA-14/Camas and Exit 1B, City Center/Convention Center on Interstate Bridge approaching Washington State Line.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 1A/Vancouver Exits
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 1A (WA) WA-14/Camas, and overhead for next three Vancouver exits. Taken at foot of Interstate Bridge on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 304
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 304, Portland Blvd. Overhead for next three exits.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 305
item.description: Use Exit 305, Lombard St., for Portland Airport, and Air National Guard. Overhead for I-5 North to Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 306B
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 306B, Expo Center.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, 3/4 mile. Use next exit for Portland Meadows, and Portland Intl. Raceway.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 307/308
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 307, OR-99E/Delta Park/Marine Drive, and approaching Exit 308, Jantzen Beach, 1/2 mile. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 308 - Last Oregon Exit
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 308, Janzten Beach. Exit 308 is the last exit in Oregon on I-5. Distance marker showing distance to Olympia, Tacoma, and Seattle.

item.title: I-5 North Exit305AB
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 305AB, US-30 By-Pass/Lombard St, 1/2 mile.

item.description: OR-22 east approaching Exit 1B, I-5 north to Portland.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 243
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 243, Ankeny Hill.

item.title: I-5 North Exit 248/Exit 249
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 248, Sunnyside/Turner and approaching Exit 249, Commercial St, 1/2 mile.

item.description: I-5 north at Exit 286, Stafford/N. Wilsonville, approaching I-205.

item.description: I-5 north to Tigard and Portland at Exit 288, I-205/To I-84/The Dalles/Seattle.

item.description: Frontage road at Valley of the Rogue State Park to I-5 north onramp to Grants Pass.

item.description: I-5 south at Exit 43, OR-234/OR-99/Gold Hill/Crater Lake.
